trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref> class represents code generation options specified in an XML text file.
Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref>.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.CodeGenerationOptions"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.CodeGenerationOptions"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref>.
Returns a new instance of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref> based on the code generation options described in the specified stream.
The <xref href="System.IO.Stream"></xref> that contains the code generation options.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler"></xref> to be associated with the new instance of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref>.
A new instance of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref> based on the code generation options described in the specified stream.

Returns a new instance of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref> based on the code generation options described in the specified <xref href="System.IO.TextReader"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.IO.TextReader"></xref> that contains the code generation options.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler"></xref> to be associated with the new instance of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref>.
A new instance of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref> based on the code generation options described in the specified <xref href="System.IO.TextReader"></xref>.

Returns a new instance of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref> based on the code generation options described in the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> that contains the code generation options.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler"></xref> to be associated with the new instance of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref>.
A new instance of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref> based on the code generation options described in the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref>.
Gets the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref>.

Gets a <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection"></xref> that represents the schema importer extensions associated with this <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref>.

A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection"></xref> that represents the schema importer extensions associated with this <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref>.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImportStyle"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImportStyle"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that contains the target namespace for the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref>.
Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Boolean"></xref> value that indicates whether verbose warning messages are to be generated during compilation of a client proxy or a server stub.
`true` if verbose warning messages are to be generated during compilation of a client proxy or a server stub; otherwise, `false`.
